CustomField.description: Identifies the User who will be detailed as the Invoice Entity's Invoice Contact. The invoice contact and their contact details will be detailed on standard Invoice emails to be used in case of invoice queries.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies the User who will be detailed as the Invoice Entity's Invoice Contact. The invoice contact and their contact details will be detailed on standard Invoice emails to be used in case of invoice queries.
CustomField.label: Contact for Invoice Queries
